caseTitle: Market Committee, Multan through its Chairman and another v. Additional Commissioner (Consolidation), Multan and others
tagline: Discussion: (1) Section 3, 4, 9, 21, 29 & 35 of Punjab Agricultural Produce Markets Ordinance, 1978. (2) Rule 14, 15 & 21 of Punjab Agricultural Produce Markets (General) Rules, 1979. (3) Doctrine of estoppel & acquiescence under Article 114 of Qanun-e-Shahdat Order, 1984. (4) Qui non negat, fatetur- silence shows consent.
